口.definition: mouth; classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc); classifier for bites or mouthfuls

口不應心.definition: to say one thing but mean another; to dissimulate

口不擇言.definition: to speak incoherently; to ramble; to talk irresponsibly

口乾舌燥.definition: lit. dry mouth and tongue (idiom); to talk too much

口令.definition: oral command; a word of command (used in drilling troops or gymnasts); password (used by sentry)

口供.definition: oral confession (as opposed to 筆供|笔供[bi3 gong4]); statement; deposition

口傳.definition: to convey orally; to pass on by word of mouth (instructions, information, stories etc)

口出狂言.definition: to speak conceited nonsense; to come out with arrogant claptrap

口北.definition: the area north of the Great Wall

口口聲聲.definition: to keep on saying (idiom); to repeat over and over again

口吃.definition: to stammer; to stutter; Taiwan pr. [kou3ji2]

口吐毒焰.definition: lit. a mouth spitting with poisonous flames; to speak angrily to sb (idiom)

口吻.definition: tone of voice; connotation in intonation; accent (regional etc); snout; muzzle; lips; protruding portion of an animal's face

口味.definition: a person's preferences; tastes (in food); flavor

口嚼酒.definition: alcoholic drink made by fermenting chewed rice

口嫌體正直.definition: your lips say one thing, but your body language reveals what you really think (borrowed from Japanese)

口嫌體直.definition: your lips say one thing, but your body language reveals what you really think (four-character version of 口嫌體正直|口嫌体正直[kou3 xian2 ti3 zheng4 zhi2])

口子.definition: hole; opening; cut; gap; gash; my husband or wife; classifier for people (used for indicating the number of people in a family etc); precedent

口實.definition: food; salary (old); a pretext; a cause for gossip

口岸.definition: a port for external trade; a trading or transit post on border between countries

口徑.definition: bore; caliber; diameter; aperture; (fig.) stance (on an issue); version (of events); account; narrative; line

口快心直.definition: see 心直口快[xin1 zhi2 kou3 kuai4]

口播.definition: (broadcasting) to speak to the audience; to advertise a product by speaking directly to the audience; endorsement (by a celebrity for a product, delivered orally)

口服.definition: to take medicine orally; oral (contraceptive etc); to say that one is convinced

口氣.definition: tone of voice; the way one speaks; manner of expression; tone

口沫橫飛.definition: (idiom) to speak vehemently; to express oneself with great passion

口湖.definition: Kouhu township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

口湖鄉.definition: Kouhu township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan

口無擇言.definition: to say not a word that is not appropriate (idiom); wrongly used for 口不擇言|口不择言[kou3 bu4 ze2 yan2]

口無遮攔.definition: to blab; to shoot one's mouth off; to commit a gaffe

口甜.definition: soft-spoken; affable; full of honeyed words

口白.definition: narrator; spoken parts in an opera

口碑.definition: public praise; public reputation; commonly held opinions; current idiom

口碑流傳.definition: widely praised (idiom); with an extensive public reputation

口碑載道.definition: lit. praise fills the roads (idiom); praise everywhere; universal approbation

口福.definition: happy knack for chancing upon fine food

口糊.definition: indistinct in one's speech; defective in one's pronunciation

口腔炎.definition: stomatitis; ulceration of oral cavity; inflammation of the mucous lining of the mouth

口舌.definition: dispute or misunderstanding caused by gossip; to talk sb round

口若懸河.definition: mouth like a torrent (idiom); eloquent; glib; voluble; have the gift of the gab

口蜜腹劍.definition: lit. honeyed words, a sword in the belly (idiom); fig. hypocritical and murderous

口袋罪.definition: vaguely defined offense that can be broadly interpreted and potentially abused by law enforcement

口訣.definition: mnemonic chant; rhyme for remembering (arithmetic tables, character stroke order etc)

口誅筆伐.definition: to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom); to denounce by word and pen

口語.definition: colloquial speech; spoken language; vernacular language; slander; gossip; CL:門|门[men2]

口誤.definition: to misspeak; to get one's words mixed up; a slip of the tongue

口說無憑.definition: (idiom) you can't rely on a verbal agreement; just because sb says sth, doesn't mean it's true

口足目.definition: Stomatopoda, order of marine crustaceans (whose members are called mantis shrimps)

口鋒.definition: manner of speech; tone of voice

口頭禪.definition: Zen saying repeated as cant; (fig.) catchphrase; mantra; favorite expression; stock phrase

口頭語.definition: pet phrase; regularly used expression; manner of speaking

口風.definition: meaning behind the words; what sb really means to say; one's intentions as revealed in one's words; tone of speech

口齒.definition: mouth and teeth; enunciation; to articulate; diction; age (of cattle, horses etc)

口齒伶俐.definition: eloquent and fluent speaker (idiom); grandiloquence; the gift of the gab

口齒生香.definition: eloquence that generates perfume (idiom); profound and significant text
